of the uterus or fetid lochia, and/or a leukocytosis of more than 10 000/mm 3) (89, 91). 
Fernandez and colleagues reported lower occurrence of endometritis among women 
receiving amoxicillin-clavulanate compared to those receiving no treatment (OR 0.27, 
95% CI 0.09 to 0.83) (91). Among women receiving methylergometrine, occurrence of 
endometritis was not significantly different from those receiving placebo (211 women; OR 
1.96, 95% CI 0.18 to 21.97)
